metadata.title: CVE-2019-16935 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The documentation XML-RPC server in Python through 2.7.16, 3.x through 3.6.9, and 3.7.x through 3.7.4 has XSS via the server_title field. This occurs in Lib/DocXMLRPCServer.py in Python 2.x, and in Lib/xmlrpc/server.py in Python 3.x. If set_server_title is called with untrusted input, arbitrary JavaScript can be delivered to clients that visit the http URL for this server.

notes.note: leosilva> this bug address to the docxmlrpc test hang issue: https://bugs.python.org/issue27614.

criterions.comment: python2.7 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.17-1ubuntu5').
